questions.title: 是的，我以前是一位医生。
questions.answer: Yes, I was a doctor before.

questions.title: 因为我喜欢教英文，我现在是一位英文老师。
questions.answer: Because I like to teach English, I am an English teacher now.

questions.title: 你何时在这个城市（city）里教英文呢？
questions.answer: When did you teach English in this city?

questions.title: 去年我开始在这个城市里教英文。
questions.answer: I started to teach English in this city last year.

questions.title: 你以前在哪里教英文？
questions.answer: Where did you teach English before?

questions.title: 我两年之前（two years ago）在台北教英语。
questions.answer: I taught English in Taipei two years ago.

questions.title: 台北也是一个漂亮的城市。
questions.answer: Taipei is also a beautiful city.
